mapper.select: select "o_num" from "ORDER" where "id"=#{id} and rownum =1 order by O_DATE desc

select * from (select col1.o_date, col1."o_num", col2.product_name, col2.PRICE, col2."o_quant", col1.o_status from ORDER_LIST col2, "ORDER" col1 where col1."o_num" = col2."o_num") where "o_num" = #{orderNum};

select ROWNUM,col1.o_date, col1."o_num", col2.product_name, col2.PRICE, col2."o_quant", col1.o_status,col2."pro_num",col2.key from "ORDER" col1,ORDER_LIST col2 where col2."o_num"=col1."o_num" and col2."o_num"= #{orderNum} and (ROWNUM >= #{p1} and ROWNUM <= #{p2})

select col1.o_date, col1."o_num", col2.product_name, col2.PRICE, col2."o_quant", col1.o_status,col2."pro_num",col2.key from "ORDER" col1,ORDER_LIST col2 where col2."o_num"=col1."o_num" and col2."o_num"= #{orderNum} and col2.key=#{key}

select ROWNUM,col3.C_STATE,col3."c_type",col.* from (select col1.o_date, col1."o_num", col2.product_name, col2.PRICE, col2."o_quant", col1.o_status,col2."pro_num",col2.key from "ORDER" col1,ORDER_LIST col2 where col2."o_num"=col1."o_num" and col2."o_num"= #{orderNum}) col,change col3 where col.key=col3.key and ROWNUM >= #{p1} and ROWNUM <= #{p2}
select * from ORDER_LIST order by "o_num" desc
select distinct p.PRO_NUM, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.FRONT_IMAGE1 from (select "pro_num" from "ORDER" o , ORDER_LIST ol where o."o_num" = ol."o_num") pn, product p where pn."pro_num" = p.PRO_NUM
